feed.title: Channel-Port aux Basques - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Channel-Port aux Basques
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:20 PM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port aux Basques 01:30 AM NST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Temperature: 1.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 1.7°C
Wind: SSW 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Rain at times heavy. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy changing to showers overnight. Fog patches. Amount 15 to 25 mm except locally 40 mm in areas of heaviest rain. Wind south 50 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 in the Wreckhouse area this evening. Wind becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 near midnight then west 30 gusting to 50. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 20 February 2023
